sections.text: A skyship captain offers you passage to the Glass Peaks in exchange for help with navigation.

options.description: Decline and explore the market instead.

sections.text: Onboard, a storm approaches. The compass spins wildly.

options.description: Calmly help the navigator recalibrate the compass.
Hide below deck until the storm passes.

sections.text: At the market you find a tinkerer selling a curious glass shard said to be from the Peaks.

options.description: Buy the shard and seek the Peaks alone.

consequence.text: The shard's warmth steadies your nerves.

options.description: Return to the harbor and accept the captain's offer.

sections.text: Your steady hands save the ship. The captain rewards you with a map to a hidden glacier cave.
Below deck you miss the chance to steer; the ship drifts but the crew recovers. You learn humility.
The shard leads you to a friendly hermit who guides you to a secret path up the Peaks.
